name: Devil Warship Makujin
description:
Go, Kinrunner!

Your consciousness from this moment on shall be merged with the body of this great cybernetic machine created by Eternal God Gokagu.
Together you shall defeat the demonic warship that is Makujin. Use this new body wisely, for the devil's minions can still destroy it if you are careless.
There is no way back now. Fight now, for this is your destiny.

CONTROLS:
Arrow Keys - Movement
Z - Shooting

Follow the onscreen instructions in the upgrade menu after each level.
